trajectory.action:
<think>
I need to clean some potatoes and then put them in the garbage can. First, I should check if I have the potatoes in my inventory. If I don't have them, I will need to find them, likely in one of the cabinets or the fridge. 

Since I am currently in the middle of the room, I can go to any of the cabinets or the fridge to look for the potatoes. The fridge is a likely place to find potatoes, so I will head there first. After checking the fridge, if I find the potatoes, I can then clean them and proceed to the garbage can to dispose of them. 

If I don't find the potatoes in the fridge, I will need to check the cabinets one by one until I locate them. For now, my best action is to go to the fridge to see if the potatoes are there.
</think>

<action>go to fridge 1</action>
